name: NiTT
description:
Nitt is a minimalistic mobile roguelike where a short range teleport doubles as your only movement and combat option. You get to decide whether to use this ability offensive or defensive as you try to make it to the end.

Nitt was born out of the apparnt lack of roguelikes on mobile specifically catered towards the platform. Nitt features touch-anywhere, one-touch controls in portrait mode, making it super comfortable playing experience for both right and left handed players.
